summary: This is a purchase order from SigNet Technologies, Inc. to ADI for network equipment, with a revised ship-to address for 'MCC New York' at 150 Park Row, New York, NY. The document is a financial record showing a transaction totaling over $400,000, with a buyer named Fred Pridemore.

persons.name: Fred Pridemore
persons.context: Listed as the buyer on a purchase order from SigNet Technologies, Inc. for network equipment.

events.title: Purchase Order Issued
events.description: SigNet Technologies, Inc. issued a purchase order (F8P000391) to ADI for network equipment, with a revised ship-to address for MCC New York.

locations: 12300 Kiln Court Suite E Beltsville, MD 20705
keyFacts: The document is a purchase order from SigNet Technologies, Inc. to ADI, dated August 20, 2019.
The ship-to address was revised to 'MCC New York' at 150 Park Row, New York, NY 10007.
The total amount of the purchase order is $402,598.83.
The buyer listed is Fred Pridemore.
The document is a financial record potentially showing a transaction for equipment delivery to a New York address.
